text: The CAF Confederation Cup is a seasonal association football competition run by the Confederation of African Football. It is the second club football competition in the continent behind the CAF Champions League. It was established in 2004. ==List of finals== {|class="wikitable" |+Key |- | width="40px" bgcolor="#ffff99" align="center"|# | Match was won on an away goals |- | width="40px" bgcolor="#cedff2"
